title: The last proceedings of the Scots, being a report by a messenger sent from the English Commissioners at Sunderland, with letters to the Lord Wharton, Sir Henry Vain, &c. Delivered to the Parliament on Saturdry [sic], Aprill 6. 1644. By Master John Hardy. With a warrant signed, by William Row. Secretary to the Commissionets [sic].
author: Hardy, John, 17th cent.
publisher: Printed by Andrew Coe, and published according to order,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
